Key Match Events: Anthony Edwards scored the go-ahead basket with a floating jump shot that put Minnesota on top 117-116 with 25.7 seconds to go.
Denver played down the stretch without guard Jamal Murray, who left in the third quarter after colliding with Randle.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Timberwolves trailed by 10 points in the fourth quarter before closing the game on a 17-4 run to secure the victory.
Others: Aaron Gordon scored a game-high 31 points and grabbed 11 rebounds for Denver.
Nikola Jokic had 26 points, 13 assists and nine rebounds for Denver.
Michael Porter Jr. also logged 26 points for Denver.
Christian Braun added 14 points for Denver.
